I am searching a site and I want to limit it to just a subset of urls  
that match the pattern /show/artist.  Right now it crawls anything.

I thought SURT logic would do it, but it doesn't seem to parse below  
the www.mysite.com level of a URL...   Or am I understanding SURT  
wrong?  My SURT patterns were just done by pasting in a full URL and  
seeing what came out.

Also, how would I filter archiving of images, css, etc..  I only want  
HTML pages.
